feed.title: Developer turned Designer
feed.subtitle: I'm a developer that's trying to learn how to design by learning one small design lesson, every single day.

entry.title: Hello
entry.content:
Hello there! My name’s Yazin, and I’m a developer. I’ve always wanted to get better at designing things, but could never really get around to it.

So here’s my attempt at doing that — in baby steps!

Everyday, I’ll plan to spend about 15 to 30 minutes learning a new lesson in design. Alot of this will, naturally, be about CSS!

I know a few things, but this’ll help me practice — and hopefully, reach an adequate level before too long.

Let’s get started!
